tool_description: An API that gives you the current Day/Time, it will give you the current time as GMT.
name: SimpleTimeAPI
title: SimpleTimeAPI

api_list.name: Time (Seconds)
api_list.description: Gives you the current time with seconds
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simpletimeapi.p.rapidapi.com/times"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simpletimeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
